By Trainerly on Saturday, September 22, 2012 - 09:39 am:

Fire mane. Please read my thread on Gameshark vs. CD.
I believe I have finally cracked the misconception that there
are differences. You can just turn on the shark modifier and
keep the mr2 disc in to get any monster you want, without their
actual CD. Just don't use it on preexisting monsters, or they
will be genetically the same as the original monster but just
appear to be different.

Hope this helps.
